last_episode_to_air.name: Epilogue
last_episode_to_air.overview: With American Apparel behind him, Dov forges a new path, which looks a lot like the old one.

name: Big Rad Wolf
overview: American Apparel was initially celebrated for its provocative advertising and message of social change. Then the unpredictability of its founder imploded the iconic company. This is the story of the brand -- good, bad, and ugly -- as told by the people who lived it.

episodes.name: Meet Dov
episodes.overview: American Apparel embodied a cultural moment in the 2000s. Until its enigmatic founder became a liability.

episodes.name: Made in the USA
episodes.overview: Those closest to Dov Charney give insight into the man behind the iconic brand.

episodes.name: F*ck Work-Life Balance
episodes.overview: Former American Apparel employees discuss the unconventional ways Dov would motivate his young employees.

episodes.name: Apex
episodes.overview: When American Apparel goes public, Dov faces greater public scrutiny.

episodes.name: Legalize American Apparel
episodes.overview: American Apparel’s well-known stance on undocumented workers attracts the unwanted attention of ICE.

episodes.name: Lost in Los Mirada
episodes.overview: In light of sexual harassment allegations, Dov’s attempt to create a more efficient warehouse system plunges the company into disaster.

episodes.name: The Laws of Power
episodes.overview: American Apparel’s board prepare to take drastic measures to rescue the company from Dov’s indiscretions.

episodes.name: War
episodes.overview: Dov appears in court for a last-ditch attempt to maintain ownership of American Apparel.

episodes.name: Epilogue
episodes.overview: With American Apparel behind him, Dov forges a new path, which looks a lot like the old one.
